org.orgName: Third Judicaial Distrcit of Washington Territory

div1.p: In the District Court of . the Third Judical District of Washington Territory, holding terms at Seattle
In the matter of the application of Joseph Bowens for a Writs of Habeas Corpus

To the judges of said court. The petition of Joseph Bomens I Thnk your petitonres is unlawfully unpracied, detained and mastering of his lively by was co chance sheriff of this county, Washington Territory, in thee county of said count and the city of Seeattle. II Thank the court or presicutor of said impriosnment, detention, and restrained according to the best knowledge and belief of your petionioner, is that the said if the court holds your petion by virtual of an alleged commitment by M. Sodenberg a Justice of the peach in and for said County communicating
your petinoer to the County jail of said county upon a charge of assault and battery.

III That the said inprisonment, detiontion said restrined and illegal and the illegallity there of courts in this to with; I that our fee (dat of Nov. 1887), your petitioner was brought before said justice of the peace, N.Sedenbang, charged with assult and battery in said King County; that thereafter of the 2nd day of Nov. 1887. The said Jusice of the peaces and your petitioner quielty said crime
